room_title: Escape room "Voodoo Spirits" by PanIQ Escape Room Chicago in Chicago
review: Had a great time!! This is something you must do. The gentleman was fun and professional, highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Voodoo Spirits" by PanIQ Escape Room Chicago in Chicago
review: My friends and I had a fun time here! The manager is so very nice and accomodating, and it was a great experience overall. I would highly recommend this location and to absolutely give it a try if you're debating. The location is also a short walk to many great restaraunts and bars for afterwards, which is a plus!

room_title: Escape room "Voodoo Spirits" by PanIQ Escape Room Chicago in Chicago
review: Yessss I had had a ball we did jump the gun but all and all I had a ball we were soooooo new to this experience but on a scale of new and boring to new and exciting we definitely PanIQed in the PanIQ room lol If you have never done this before this is definitely a place to test the waters.Btw we did the voodoo room and this is the most difficult room needless to say we were 75% done TAKE IT ROOM BY ROOM LOL
